TEXT.TITLE: FINANCIAL SECURITY <FSSLA.O> TO BE ACQUIRED
TEXT.BODY: Financial Security Savings and Loan Association said it signed a letter of intent for a controlling interest to be acquired by an investor group led by South Florida developer William Landa. Terms were not disclosed. Reuter
